txt.en: 'Thank you, friend. I thought this was the end. Please, save our city.'
'Were you not here, surely I would have died.'
'The city still burns. Hurry, there are others in need. I will be fine.'
Meet Mizâdi back at the tower of Kûr Anzar.
Meet Mizâdi back at the tower of Kûr Anzar
Put out straw fires and rescue trapped citizens in Kûr Anzar.
'I cannot thank you enough. Please, the city is ablaze, others need aid.'
'I- I was just defending my home when they attacked. Thank you.'
'Please, stop the fire, our city... our families....'
Tend to wounded Kûr Anzar citizens ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Tended to wounded Kûr Anzar citizens ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Okhíso, seeking to divert your attention, has set Kûr Anzar aflame. That was not enough to stay Mizâdi's blade but now the city needs to be saved. You must put out the fires and rescue trapped citizens in Kûr Anzar.
Instance: A Blade of Flame and Fury, Part 3
